column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last night , I decided to take a bath .
#text=I fiddled with the knobs to get the right mix of hot and cold water .
#text=Once the temperature was pleasing to me , I put the stopper in the tub and let the tub fill with water .
#text=I also poured some bubble bath into the water stream so that bubbles filled the tub .
#text=Once the tub was filled with water and bubbles , I took off my clothes and sat down in the tub .
#text=I submerged my body in the soapy water .
#text=I used a loofah to wash myself .
#text=I then sat back and relaxed in the tub for a while .
#text=I had put the book that I was reading on the side of the tub and I decided to read it .
#text=When I was done in the tub , I pulled the stopper out and let the water drain away .
